On Thu, Jan 21, 2016 at 7:59 PM, Minux Ma <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I think updating to a new release via source code will also be easier with
> the release branch.
>
> Previously you have to first figure out which tag to check out (or
> download) and then checkout and build. Now you just pull and build.


And just hope for the best? I don't think it's unreasonable that people
have to type the version they expect to run.

Russ
